name: Kovacs
description:
"Year 2076. Planet Earth.

The environment is destroyed and parts of the planet have become uninhabitable. Humans are trying to survive in the now chaotic world. New technologies are everywhere. These technologies are one of the last means available to help the inhabitants of the planet survive. In an attempt to save the human race, all remaining nations have joined together to create Federal Districts.

A few years ago, following an argument with his father, leader of Federal District 6, Kovacs, a strong and cultured young man, decided to abandon his family and his home city to go on an adventure. Over the course of several years, he discovers the world, opens his mind and establishes bonds, notably with Lia, an artificial intelligence and lifelong friend.

While Kovacs is wandering, he learns that his parents have been murdered. Mad with rage, he plans to take revenge and and must prevent Federal District 6 from being subjected to dictatorship. "
